person.persName: James H. Bridgewater (Lincoln County, Ky, laborer and soldier)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Susan Dawes Bridgewater in Stanford, Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1854. Father of Volney A. Bridgewater and Sarah H. Bridgewater. Laborer in Lincoln County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from October 8, 1861 until he resigned on January 7, 1862. Chief of police in Stanford, Kentucky, in 1863. Served in the Hall's Gap Battalion as a captain from June 1, 1864, to March 1, 1865. Served in the Hall's Gap Battalion as a from March 1, 1865 to July 27, 1865.
